snippet: The second Hangout in our London 2012 series took place earlier today with divers Cassidy Krug and Kristian Ipsen, their coach Rick Schavone and The Times's Joe Ward.
abstract: The second Hangout in our London 2012 series took place earlier today with divers Cassidy Krug and Kristian Ipsen, their coach Rick Schavone and The Times's Joe Ward.

headline.main: Video: Google+ Hangout With U.S. Olympic Divers
